field.name: offline_page_bg_image_style
field.default: no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover;
field.label: TPL_FAV_OFFLINE_PAGE_BG_IMAGE_STYLE_LABEL

option.value: repeat; background-attachment: initial; -webkit-background-size: auto; -moz-background-size: auto; -o-background-size: auto; background-size: auto;

no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover;
